attributes.action: Abolish London Rule in Scotland & Ireland!
attributes.additional_details: Abolish Westminster rule in Scotland Northern Ireland. These countries are currently being ruled by the 'UK' government who have the power to make choices that affect the Scottish and Northern Irish people. Why do we settle for this? Why can't the people who care most about these countries- The Scottish and Irish people get to make the decisions that affect them? It's time to show progress in theAbolish Westminster rule in Scotland Northern Ireland. These countries are currently being ruled by the 'UK' government who have the power to make choices that affect the Scottish and Northern Irish people. Why do we settle for this? Why can't the people who care most about these countries- The Scottish and Irish people get to make the decisions that affect them? It's time to show progress in the world! It's time to stand up and make a change! Give these countries these choices.It's not a lot to ask.
